content:
I've added a reminder to log your workouts on your fitness app after each class. Here's the updated list:

**Tuesday**: 6:30 pm - Zumba class
**Tuesday** (after class): Log workout on fitness app
**Thursday**: 6:30 pm - Zumba class
**Thursday** (after class): Log workout on fitness app
**Saturday**: 10:00 am - Weightlifting class
**Saturday** (after class): Log workout on fitness app

This way, you'll be reminded to track your progress and stay consistent with your fitness goals!

Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.
